page.title: 19A Day in a Child's Life.
page.content: I get up at 7.30am every week day and I am ready to have breakfast at 8.00am.I wear my school uniform which consists of a grey skirt,a white shirt,a black and white tie and a grey cardigan.At 8.30am I leave for school which starts at 9.00am.Our morning break is from 10.30am until 10.45am and we stop for lunch at 12.30pm.The afternoon is from 1.30pm until 3.15pm.Our work for the day is usually maths,English or project but depending on the day we could also have P.E.,art or craft.For lunch I go to the school cafeteria where I buy a hotdog, flavoured milk,chocolate and crisps.As soon as I get home I do my homework then some piano practice.Before tea I like to watch television.After tea I go out to play or watch television again.Before going to bed at 9.45pm I have supper.
